segments.text: Can you help me do an internet search ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you want to find ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to find information on the American Civil War .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , can you be more specific ? There are a lot of websites about that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I want to know about the battle of Gettysburg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . Well , go to google.com , and type in “ Battle of Gettysburg . ”
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh wow , there are a lot of sites .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , try this one . It ’ s a good site about Gettysburg .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For detailed information , however , you should read a history book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . If I ’ m interested , I ’ ll go to the library .
segments.speaker: S1
